import * as React from 'react' import { CubeSpinner } from '../Spinner/Spinner' import css from './Loading.module.css' interface ILoadingComponent { show: boolean transparent?: boolean fadeout?: boolean slideout?: boolean } const Loading: React.FunctionComponent = ({ show, transparent, fadeout, slideout }): JSX.Element => { const styles = [ css.Loading, transparent && css.transparent, (!show && fadeout) && css.fadeout, (!show && slideout) && css.slideout, ].join(' ') console.log(show, fadeout) return (
) } export default Loading
